google_play_reviews.content: Excellent launcher. If it allowed us to pin certain apps to the history menu rather than just freeze history it would get 5 stars.
The best minimalistic launcher I've ever had. Well done to the developers.

This is my absolute favorite launcher of all time! It's opensource, lightweight, has widget support, has icon pack support, has multiple themes built in with colors you can change, and excellent on battery/system resources. I just really hope the developers don't ever abandon this launcher and keep updating it!

Wish I would have know about this app earlier. I don't love many things but this app is one of them. Maybe a few things to improve would be fixing the bug that cause icons to go missing an replaced with a white circle occasionally and maybe tweaking the search to include deeper componants within settings.

I've been using this launcher for quite a while now. Have tried many launchers in the past but this one gets the blend of minimalism and features just right I think. My only problem is that sometimes the app drawer icons get stuck as white dots like some animation stopped and never proceeds. I have to go into the advanced settings and restart KISS to get them back to normal.

Came here from a different minimalist launcher, but the search bar is such a powerful and power user feature that it got me convinced to stay lol. And also the inclusion of the widgets and the many options for customization. The settings can be a bit daunting at first but spending a little time with it revealed a good level of customizability for the app. Kudos to the developer/s!

1.The app icons of certain apps from time to time goes missing, though everything works mormally. After a restart this is resolved. Please work on this. 2. While using high intensive apps such as Camera, i have noticed that the launcher crashes. So, again i would have to wait a few seconds for it to become normal. p.s the concept of this launcher is quite brilliant. People should try it at least once to get a taste.
Amazing app, some settings are hard to find, a tutorial on them would be nice, but stellar app in design, stability and execution

Even after recent update, settings are there as required but not making any changes on home screen after settings in KISS Launcher. No widgets and always showing its three options FOR search but touch they won't give any response. ONLY making effects on touch of O sign in bar.
Genius. Give it a few days for the app to work out what you use most. The search function is excellent.
Couldn't imagine living without it after a week or two of using it. Samsung Finder is unusable compared to this launcher.

Edit: not all the settings are available when searching, if i search VPN it only takes me to developer settings. Usable. Would like to have the ability to change the background color using rgb/hex, even a transparency slider could be cool. Search bar turns invisible when trying to get rid of the rounded corners.

Great launcher for those who want to be productive, and want to cut back on screen time. I wanted I simple launcher that wouldn't give distractions at work, and has good battery life for when I go hiking. The themes and ease of choosing custom icons are nice: I use the OLED theme and dark icons, to improve battery life. With this launcher I spend much less time fiddling with my phone.
Good launcher ,what exactly i was looking for.üòä

i love kiss launcher so much! I have made it really minimalist + the powerful search bar I wish we could add icons to also to the shortcuts for something specific in the app (ex: new note on Google Keep)
Good launcher
Dual app shortcut not working in history as well as main menu ,, any solution?
Transformed the way I use my phone, for the better
Beautiful
Fast, simple, lightweight launcer. Perfect for me.
its simple, easy to use ang setup, thanks ...
Perfect antidote to the cluttered and unorganized default launchers
What a joke! Still contains the dumbass Google search bar which I'm trying to get rid of. Worthless.

loved it, switched from Microsoft launcher for the quicker and smarter search that includes app shortcutsüß°! only things I miss are the scrollable widget space(feed/glance), grid layout for widgets on home screen and document search. this launcher is great and would be better if we can move around the widgets instead of just at the top
keep it super super :)
I like search, and the right or left swipe to your apps.
Please let us have the ability to hide the three dots only. And also split screen support.

This launcher lets you tag your apps, view/search/filter tags in the app drawer. This alone is a great feature. It's pretty straightforward for a launcher - it's fast, compact, minimal. My only complaint is that it lacks documentation, and some functions are obscure. Take "minimalism" for example. Turning it on lets you put widgets on your home screen. Turning OFF minimalism disables widgets and does... Something? A really good app, but feels just slightly unfinished.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: I agree, documentation is lacking sometimes. You can check out help.kisslauncher.com for some resources however!

google_play_reviews.content: Feature Request 1. Material You 2. Hiding the icons in history should remove it entirely. Now there's a space in place of the icon.
Wonderful launcher. Simple. No big fuss. Easy to use.
app crashes everytime i try to add a widget. not able to add. rest is okay ! great app

So simple and awesome

Good and beutiful

google_play_reviews.content: Great launcher idea, but unfortunately execution seems to be not that great. Performance is so bad sometimes it takes up to ~5 seconds to load. Calculator is now randomly gone for some reason. As far as I'm aware, neither is the case here.
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Code is fully open source, and extendable üòä
Calculator is still here, maybe you disabled it from the settings?

The best.
I love this, But there's a weird bug. The keyboard is showing up, but the typing is not showing up or not registering in the launcher. Sometimes get kinda annoying

This is the greatest launcher of all time. It has very fast access to whatever I need... ‚ù§Ô∏è

This launcher set the standard for other launchers for me in terms of having easy access to the keyboard to open apps, shortcuts, and settings + doing away with auto-categorization (e.g. Smart Launcher 5). But KISS is not quite as polished as I hoped, with confusing settings, reverse ABC order, and a fast scroll that's hard to reach with one hand. Edit: with the "display keyboard on start" option, I'm using this as an app search now on another launcher until Android 12. Works very good actually!
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Thanks for the feedback! I agree that the settings are messy, sadly there is no easy way to clean them without making the app much bigger üò¢ Curious about the comment on the fast scroll however, how would you have done it differently?
Edit: the scroll needs to be the same height as the the app üòï no easy solution here

google_play_reviews.content: Thank you very much I really love this launcher. I tried so many and this grew on me.

This is the best launcher I have ever used. I started relying heavily on the App Search in Pixel launcher but when that broke I looked got alternatives and this is basically that: an app search with favourites, tags and very light theme. Brilliant!
Muy sencilla y acelera el celular, la recomiendo mucho.

Just perfect

google_play_reviews.content: This launcher is very awsome and allows me to hide apps that I cant hide with my default launcher. It also helped reduce my screen time thanks to its minimalist design. google_play_reviews.content: Best launcher I've ever used and ive used all the major ones (and many others too). Too many are focused on all these useless gimmick features. All I wanted was a nice clean, empty, screen. This launcher achieves that perfectly. Been using for almost a year now with no issues. I would like to see some additional gesture support but other than that I have no suggestions. It's perfect and exactly what I've been looking for. Oh and it's FOSS. I'd give this 6 stars if I could.
Awesome
It enables you to open the app which you want with very little interaction, since last used is first. Once you used to it any other launcher feels like much work for finding the apps.
This is my favorite launcher. However, recently widget is gone (minimalistic UI enabled). This is after I updated my phone to Android 12. Still a 5 for me though.
The best launcher interface period.

I love this launcher! It has been my favorite that I always come back to. Nothing else can beat the search function. I use a widget called launchy and a short cut called pop up widget to get the most out of the one widget. I do wish that you could change the icon for the group tabs though.

google_play_reviews.content: I have been using this launcher for the past one year. Absolutely stable and user friendly. I love the feature to freeze the history, so the list appearing on homepage is stable and i can always reach the required app instantly. Adding/removing to the lists, tags etc are extremely user friendly. Launcher works at lightning speed and without any issues whatsoever. I'm using KISS launcher on almost 4+ years old lenova vibe and it still feels like a new phone. Thank you Neamar for the wonderful piece of software.
Awesome launcher
It has been my launcher on several devices for years now, its minimal interface enhances my focus and keeps the device clutter free. Excellent work!

My new favorite launcher, replacing Nova Pro. I found this in an alternate app store and installed from here just to leave this review. Before that,  Android did not officially support the option, apps simply displayed a black screen, that's not a real lock. And you can add the weather widget too :) Instructions here: https://help.kisslauncher.com/widgets/add-a-widget/

google_play_reviews.content: Huge boost for device performance, good ux

Love it, simple, light, and BLACK!

Awesome. Wow. I think developer really understood and worked on usability. The best option I like which many launcher like Nova, MiUi, Smart doesn't offer is 'View in Playstore' when long tap on app icon. Awesome. The only thing I would advise is, you give some space on upper side of screen for temperature, day and date and just make this an option. Not mandatory as you say Keep it simple and stupid, well said. Please don't add irrelevant stuff in future updates and spoil it. You are best.

If you'd like an elegant but minimalist launcher then KISS is perfect for you! Also, if you are a fan of the GNOME desktop on Linux this is a similar kind of experience when set to minimalist UI. I love this launcher so much!

google_play_reviews.content: Light weight simple useful
Awesome launcher, light and simple as possible
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello! I had a look and sadly, shortcuts are not supported anymore in Android since Oreo: see https://github.com/Neamar/KISS/pull/1104 for all the details. Therefore, you can add new style shortcuts, but old apps using the legacy method can't be supported in recent Android :(

google_play_reviews.content: Awesome minimal launcher. I've been using it for a while and I'm not planning on using anything but KISS in the future. Sometimes a bit buggy when activating the keyboard, but it's not a big deal. It seems like when I have the keyboard set to 'always show' it will sometimes not register when typing. sometimes it's just the first character not getting caught.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thanks for the feedback, that is sadly a known android system bug for launchers with a kehboard. Google is working on it, in the meantime as a workaround you can just press the kiss circle twice (display apps, hide apps), this will restore focus to the keyboard. Sorry, that's the best we have until it gets fixed properly üò¢

google_play_reviews.content: the launcher has huge potential for greatness. please consider the following improvements on your future updates. 1. implement an option to lock the desktop. this is very important because favorite apps can be easily removed and even excluded from app list 2. launcher settings needs password protection. 3. make search function and three dots accessible only when the search bar is pressed. this would make the desktop super clean and avoid annoying keyboard pop ups every now and then
Why is app drawer Z-A ?
google_play_reviews.replyContent: The app has a search bar at the bottom, so everything starts from the bottom. When you search, the first item is at the end, so it makes sense to have the same thing for the app list. Two years ago it was reversed and there were a lot of negative feedback as it didn't make sense, all of a sudden the whole list was completely reversed for no reason!

google_play_reviews.content: Love the simplicity and minimalism of this app!

this launcher is great. but it can be improved by adding 1. lock desktop to prevent unnecessary and unplanned changes when we touch, especially on the favourites 2. adding guestures eg swipe up, swipe down, swipe left, swipe right. 3. adding support for short cuts on the favourites.
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Hello!
1/ can't be done with the standard permission model from Android :(
2/ see https://help.kisslauncher.com/advanced/gestures/ :)
3/ There is already support :) see for instance https://help.kisslauncher.com/contacts/whatsapp-contacts/ for an example with WhatsApp. You can then add the shortcuts to favorites

google_play_reviews.content:
Minimalism at a level where I don't miss any feature and I don't miss any. 
Blazingly fast, pretty smart, perfectly customizable, extremely small. Not 
sure if possible, but perhaps add a feature so it's always loaded in RAM 
and running on the background?
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks! Kiss should always remain in ram if it is your default launcher, unless the system is running extremely low in memory. If you play games for instance, kiss gets killed by the OS and then restarted
